doc: (list) A Xml String specifying a extension type
[["7zip", "zip"], ["public.zip-archive"], "org.kivy.myappextension"
"file", "<MyCustom> Extension File", "${MACOSX_BUNDLE_ICON_FILE}"
"http://mysite.com/myapp/extensions.html"]
(str) Camera Usage justification string
"<App> uses Camera to do <X and Y and Z>"
(bool) Whether or not to sign the code
(str) Name of the certificate to use for signing the debug version
Get a list of available identities: buildozer ios list_identities
(str) The development team to use for signing the debug version
(str) The development team to use for signing the release version
(str) Name of the certificate to use for signing the release version
(str) ios-deploy branch
(str) ios-deploy directory
(str) ios-deploy branch
(str) Branch to use
(str) Path to a custom kivy-ios folder
(str) Source for kivy-ios
(str) Justification text to be provided for being able to use local network
"<App> needs permissions to <Do X and Y and Z>" in your Local Area Network
(str) URL pointing to .ipa file to be installed
This option should be defined along with `display_image_url` and `full_size_image_url` options
(str) URL pointing to an icon (57x57px) to be displayed during download
This option should be defined along with `app_url` and `full_size_image_url` options
(str) URL pointing to a large icon (512x512px) to be used by iTunes
This option should be defined along with `app_url` and `display_image_url` options
(str) Justification text to be provided for being able to select media
"<APP> needs to access your media in order to <Do X and Y and Z>"
(bool) Allow StatusBar to be controlled by API
(list) Supported orientations
Valid options are: landscape, portrait, portrait-reverse, landscape-reverse
